name: AS_GCM_CPS_ruleConditionNAICSCode
description: Component for rule condition NAICS Code
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!value: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(
      ri!ruleCondition[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.value]
    ),
    null,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_fromJson_v1"(
      ri!ruleCondition[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.value]
    )
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_INP_textField(
    required: true,
    maxLength: cons!AS_GCM_ENUM_TEXT_LENGTH_FOR_NAICS_CODE,
    placeholder: "Enter NAICS Code",
    value: local!value,
    saveInto: {
      local!value,
      a!save(
        ri!ruleCondition[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition.value],
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_toJson_v1"({ tostring(save!value) })
      ),
      ri!additionalSaves
    },
    label: if(ri!readOnly,"","Value"),
    labelPosition: if(ri!readOnly,"COLLAPSED","ABOVE"),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly
  )
)
